actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.
Measure passed Senate, amended, roll call #163 (91-0).

official_title: A resolution providing for the establishment of a timetable for Senate consideration of and Final action on legislation dealing with Watergate reform, intelligence oversight and tax privacy.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended, roll call #163 (91-0)) Expresses the Sense of the Senate that the Seate should make every effort to reach, by July 2, a final passage vote on Watergate reform, tax privacy, and intelligence oversight legislation.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the establishment of a timetable for Senate consideration of and Final action on legislation dealing with Watergate reform, intelligence oversight and tax privacy.
